name: Devout Chaplain
originalText: {T}, Tap two untapped Humans you control: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

rulings.text: You can tap any two untapped Humans you control, including ones you haven’t controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn, to pay the cost of Devout Chaplain’s activated ability. You must have controlled Devout Chaplain continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn, however.

text: {T}, Tap two untapped Humans you control: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
